elements.2211.03179_74a79adc0da70c052566dbab6a0a7: To fight climate change and accommodate the increasing population, global crop production has to be strengthened
elements.2211.03179_67fa7d2294040728cbe91b683205b: of agriculture, transforming it from carbon emitter to carbon sink is a priority, and understanding the environmental impact of agricultural management practices is a fundamental prerequisite to that
elements.2211.03179_486dd8f9f2c334414879357d26c5c: At the same time, the global agricultural landscape is deeply heterogeneous, with differences in climate, soil, and land use inducing variations in how agricultural systems respond to farmer actions
elements.2211.03179_5de44f04e4e4cc3fb28036245fbff: of sustainable agriculture with the provision of locally adapted management advice is thus a necessary condition for the efficient uplift of green metrics, and an integral development in imminent policies
elements.2211.03179_ed8fb8753bfa74881c6b161c6b8df: Here, we formulate personalized sustainable agriculture as a Conditional Average Treatment Effect estimation task and use Causal Machine Learning for tackling it
elements.2211.03179_8560bf07221331373d48c6723718f: Leveraging climate data, land use information and employing Double Machine Learning, we estimate the heterogeneous effect of sustainable practices on the field-level Soil Organic Carbon content in Lithuania
elements.2211.03179_79649677d8a0b594ec7bdd64b89a8: We thus provide a data-driven perspective for targeting sustainable practices and effectively expanding the global carbon sink.
elements.2211.03179_24584e01439111b6960a6a3e270e2: Climate change poses a multidimensional, complex challenge to humankind
elements.2211.03179_cc58b4b24930da506dac8f02d9516: In this context, agriculture faces a unique situation
elements.2211.03179_b6639934c0dc98b22dd90011e17a7: On the one hand, production must keep rising up to meet ever-increasing demands [1], a task that is significantly complicated by inflation, crises, and extreme, unpredictable events [2,3,4]
elements.2211.03179_a5641fc3c085d347f23194461d04f: On the other hand, it must do so in a sustainable way
elements.2211.03179_9ef01737c8592855ed74473bdcad5: Owing to decades of scientific research, the consequences of environmentally oblivious agricultural practices are by now well understood [5,6]
elements.2211.03179_8f9dfb41bd01bb07acae2ce79f94f: A unique opportunity also surfaced; since agricultural land comprises 38
elements.2211.03179_f86031528a4b60f92dcf08d30960d: of the global land surface [7], agriculture offers a clear path towards mitigating climate change, by maximizing the carbon that crops naturally sequester, thus creating a substantial carbon sink [8]
elements.2211.03179_4246a99acf9446bb88fa64457a9e2: As a result, insights on the impacts of sustainable agricultural practices, especially with regards to their effect on Soil Organic Carbon (SOC) are invaluable, not only for sustainability purposes, but also for the reliability, fairness, and transparency of modern agricultural carbon markets
elements.2211.03179_7c061020079a26241223e5585dd8a: At the same time, the global agricultural landscape contains significant diversity in terms of climate, soil, and land use
elements.2211.03179_fa9efec7e3fd9437fa2446a020ed5: Such diversity of agricultural ecosystems frequently results in heterogeneous responses to interventions carried out by farmers; as an example, the effect of fertilizers on soil organic matter may differ depending on soil pH [9]
elements.2211.03179_cf2df272ce0e1ae4676bede818b5f: This reality is now recognized and reflected on high-stakes policy making
elements.2211.03179_d43149497426adfcd0c0b85ea95c1: In an effort to ensure a sustainable future, the latest iteration of the Common Agricultural Policy (CAP) of the European Union explicitly provides greater flexibility for adapting its measures to local conditions [10].
elements.2211.03179_0080ffaf7c535dc77a3b2e64906ce: From the perspective of artificial intelligence, such endeavor entails a personalization problem, where the end goal is to provide the farmer with targeted advice, depending on the particular farming context, on best practices to use in order to uplift sustainable metrics, such as SOC, and e.g., reimburse them accordingly
elements.2211.03179_46fa0851c24a5ddf5e3ee0462b1a2: In this context, causal Machine Learning (ML) can efficiently leverage big Earth Observation (EO) data and other agricultural information in order to arrive at quantitative insights on the impacts of sustainable agriculture
elements.2211.03179_dc565b4bc2f422899228f79c87bbb: Due to the large geographical coverage attained by EO, such methods can estimate effect heterogeneity even at the field-level, hence providing personalized and truly actionable advice towards sustainability goals
elements.2211.03179_6dcbbf22a082e6d2316a26dcc90e6: In this paper, we apply causal ML to understand the heterogeneous response of SOC content to a sustainable agriculture program and showcase a methodology for its personalization.
elements.2211.03179_d33c9d6d04f99d4c5b0f3d25c2995: Over the past decade, ML methods have made significant contributions in a variety of important tasks, including yield prediction, or pest, weed, and disease detection [11]
elements.2211.03179_0d2a1b5998924c159edf31badc74b: While such work has been fundamental in advancing precision agriculture, it is primarily based on predictive, correlation-based models, and is hence inadequate for assessing causal relations
elements.2211.03179_660cba0164aa6f89b06d163f93d55: Recently, works that aim to explicitly model cause and effect have been published
elements.2211.03179_ddc7e994c2863e811daf6935e6fee: Enabled by large-scale EO data, among other sources, researchers have used new causal ML methods to infer the impact of conservation tillage on yield [12], or assess the suitability of agricultural land for applying crop rotation and diversification [13]
elements.2211.03179_f28a6dde4d0cde93fdba0f54fdeaa: Causal forests [14] have been employed [15] for evaluating the environmental effectiveness of various agri-environment schemes [16]
elements.2211.03179_41e286414029f538088dd37e9ff90: However, results were obtained either on a lower spatial resolution, hindering the field-level personalization of advice [12, 13], or for a single year only [15], impeding the capture of slow, long-term environmental dynamics, such as those characterising soil [17]
elements.2211.03179_df66bb8df1f25712d590b7747c470: Here, we utilize field-level SOC predictions and other geospatial data to propose a multi-year, fully personalized framework for assessing the effect of sustainable practices on SOC content and guide decision-making
elements.2211.03179_bde2af4abb9621c780f1bd23617bc: We report preliminary results for a case study in Lithuania.
elements.2211.03179_f298ea68b269f92e9838ae28e0b2c: We use data from the Lithuanian Land Parcel Identification System (LPIS) that contains national-scale information on the crop type that was cultivated on each geo-referenced field as declared by the farmers in their CAP subsidy applications
elements.2211.03179_1426c18821a57cbdcb45ec300d704: Data also contain a binary variable that indicates if a field was enrolled in an eco-friendly program and employed sustainable agricultural management practices for that year
elements.2211.03179_f3ef088e649c6b7ef7de8aabc448e: Data were collected annually, spanning a 5-year period from 2017 to 2021
elements.2211.03179_dcddc9ef9134a4f319d235d7a6897: In order to control for climate-induced confounding we incorporate 9 climate variables retrieved from the ERA5 database, namely air temperature, soil temperature and moisture, northward and eastward wind speed, evapotranspiration, leaf area index, runoff and precipitation [18]
elements.2211.03179_8be17af918ec46267ff5bed721a5b: To complete the data, we include field-level predictions of SOC content [19, 20], on which we want to examine the impact of sustainable practices
elements.2211.03179_47cbf4cb97265fcb1a819efb49bfa: Due to the dependence of the SOC content prediction method on the absence of cloud cover, we currently only use a single SOC content value for the entire 5-year period
elements.2211.03179_5ab0a13e69e70a921041ae1ed1ce7: While increasing the temporal resolution of SOC content would provide more granular insights, we note that due to the slowly changing soil properties [17], the single value we have may potentially be decently representative of the reference period and subsets of it.
elements.2211.03179_950e46d262c5b0343bcdfcc5f6c1f: We model the problem of assessing the causal effect of eco-friendly practices on SOC content in different farming contexts as a Conditional Average Treatment Effect (CATE) estimation task
elements.2211.03179_7eda8d11cb52e309c0fc190df5dc9: Using the Potential Outcomes framework, let
elements.2211.03179_0fd0826213769a4422e93b4a9e7d7: denote the value (potential outcome) of a random variable
elements.2211.03179_7a5cf38d65ff30463e18e80cedfef: if we were to treat a unit with a binary treatment
elements.2211.03179_2ef97542ad64087e28cd2dc1ba056: describing the units, the CATE is the function
elements.2211.03179_4e05df7b1e9507c2c005edb8cccb4: is the binary variable that indicates whether a field was enrolled in the eco-friendly program, and
elements.2211.03179_e8a8be6651626f7031120a4800279: are, respectively, the SOC content the field would have had if it was enrolled in the eco-friendly program (
elements.2211.03179_880e8eb2ce4800ed3e8a2a0b4a498: captures important field characteristics that drive effect heterogeneity
elements.2211.03179_f79cb94040c7bc20229d4be3d4bc6: Here, to segment the analysis per crop type,
elements.2211.03179_2436d96b846f0befe554bb836b80f: consists of 3 binary variables, corresponding to the 3 most prominent crops found in the dataset during the reference period (Table
elements.2211.03179_05c2d576cf2d9c0197071d53ffe63: We then use Double Machine Learning (DML) [21] to learn
elements.2211.03179_7d5b8fd66a7ac1253e3471c1d5f25: from the dataset, and estimate the effect of sustainable practices on SOC content as a function of
elements.2211.03179_507eba3aebf8f47f8a9c5b6cf2fe4: In a preliminary analysis, we designated as
elements.2211.03179_1f6d5c0fbc096c047e546144be999: the fields that employed sustainable practices for the years 2021 and 2020, and as
elements.2211.03179_72636aadc385aace6bc85a7810fbb: We thus temporally aggregated all ERA5 climate variables over these two years, ending up with a single (average) value for each variable per field
elements.2211.03179_4c3f6aa9afaca910bb51d2a33c47a: We applied a standard scaler to all numerical features, and used a Random Forest Regressor and Classifier for the internal predictive DML tasks
elements.2211.03179_a17fbf7b01ca246b7278dfa557f87: To retain full inference on causal effect estimates, we used the Linear DML version, as implemented in [22].
elements.2211.03179_0439d8eb37ba6f13e9e6855a7abd0: The most prominent crops found in the dataset consisted of fields with perennial pastures (PP) in both 2021 and 2020, followed by simple pastures (SP) and winter wheat (WW), also in both years
elements.2211.03179_afdbb9454a35964d5f9a934bf553c: contains the corresponding CATE estimates, quantifying the causal effect of sustainable practices on SOC content per crop, and Figure
elements.2211.03179_8b4248f479d2e24fc0b295a255b96: visualizes them for a few indicative fields
elements.2211.03179_bfa3c68ddd955a5762956b3cf633a: None of the effects are currently statistically significant at the 95
elements.2211.03179_7dea164ace528863e1812de35bec7: confidence level, a sensible result given the short time window the treatment refers to, its discrepancy with the 5-year period the SOC content values were derived from, and the slow rate of change of soil properties
elements.2211.03179_630572ed25f887b05a92cdc0465d2: As we incorporate more years and data in the analysis we will be able to explore interesting scientific questions, such as assessing whether the eco-friendly program was most efficient in perennial pastures and corroborate the growing evidence on the environmental benefits of perennialization [23].
elements.2211.03179_202161a31237141e608c5a13a2829: Our work can assist policy makers in efficiently implementing sustainable agricultural management and simultaneously enable the smart allocation of farmer subsidies, a task that has proven to be challenging [24]
elements.2211.03179_46f71060bf71be654dfb3528151a1: Climate, soil, and other land use information may also be included in the data in order to adapt the estimates on any local condition experts deem important
elements.2211.03179_3d995d20ba41c9b20708f980e4168: In that way, the idea presented in this paper can develop into a useful tool for sustainable agriculture, in line with modern policy needs and encompassing the entire agricultural chain from the policy maker to the farmer
elements.2211.03179_c0db5682628b86a0d77a451b9d094: To proceed, the temporal range of the treatment should be extended to align with the 5-year SOC content period, and domain knowledge should be incorporated in the model through structural approaches [25]
elements.2211.03179_1c13e8083fcd3184fcc559f2db7fb: The inclusion of more data on field-level agricultural practices is also important for reducing the bias of estimates
elements.2211.03179_59d4a81ff409b9a23521192510008: Finally, given the general absence of ground truth, estimates should be tested for robustness by employing modern sensitivity analyses [26].
